data.title: Awkward Sex...And The City
data.description: Awkward Sex is exactly what it sounds like: comedians reliving intimate tales about their sex life and breaking barriers about sex and dating.Hosted by Natalie Wall, the show pairs sexual inclusion with humor and sheds light on the awkward universal experience we all know and love.Awkward Sex is about taking taboo subjects and creating a safe space for people to feel seen and heard.From cocaine infused one night stands to IBS flare ups during cunnilingus, you and your friends will be hanging on to every word and excited to go out and have a sexual misadventure of your own.‚ÄúGood sex is always good sex, but it takes a special person to turn bad sex into something amazing. And that‚Äôs where our New York comedian and podcaster Natalie Wall comes in.‚Äù -Philadelphia Gay News‚ÄúThe voyeur within will delight.‚Äù ‚Äì Refinery29TICKETS

data.title: Annie Hildebrand and Friends (Live Comedy)
data.description: Watch local standout comedians do their best set at the pleasure of oneAnnie Hildebrand, comedy czar of the evening. After each set, she'll give a thumbs up or thumbs down, gladiator style, to determine if that comedian is allowed to continue their comedy career, or if they must quit forever. In the middle of the show, these stakes are then passed over to the audience where those who choose to participate are thrown into the pop culture gauntlet, competing in a round of trivia. Winners get prizes and losers must quit trivia for the rest of their lives.June‚Äôs lineup includesBrittany CarneyAnna BiancoPatrick HastieDan TreadwayArielle DundasHosted By:Annie HildebrandTICKETS

data.title: Boogie Blind Presents: Easily
data.description: Slide through Friday night , July 11th, and get right with top tier party starter and Uptown representative,DJ Boogie Blind, alongside special guests for ‚ÄúEasily‚Äù, a club night connecting nostalgic and new eras of the sounds that shaped the Big Apple whether it's Hip-Hop, Dancehall, Soul, or R&B.Pull up to Friends and Lovers and cut up for a night to remember at ‚ÄúEasily‚Äù with special guests alongside resident Boogie Blind from 10PM to 4AM every second Friday of the month.$10 general admission*$5 before 11PM w/ proof of RSVP*= No RequestsAll Sales FinalRSVPDJ Boogie Blind, is one of the most trusted and respected DJs in the industry today. As a Harlem representative, World Champion, and member of the pioneering X-Ecutioners DJ crew Boogie Blind has consistently served up NY‚Äôs true sound internationally for over two decades. Whether he‚Äôs rocking crowds for Coachella, NBA All Star Weekend, Montreux Jazz Fest, or the Espy Awards, Blind is always pushing the envelope in the booth with timeless Hip-hop, Funk, Dancehall, Disco, and House of yesterday and today.

data.title: Discount Philosophy (Live Comedy)
data.description: Part thought-provoking, part foolish: Discount Philosophy gathers some of the brightest minds in comedy to discuss life's most pressing ideas‚Äîone joke at a time.What is the meaning of life? Are we alone in the universe? What's for dinner? Join host,Spencer Simpson, and a variety of talented comedians as they interrogate questions that have plagued humanity for ages. A comedy show where great humor is matched with great inquiry: Discount Philosophy asks you to come for the laughs but stay for the confusion. Or the drinks.Saturday‚Äôs lineup TBATICKETS

data.title: Feel the News 4 Year Anniversary w Marcela Onyango
data.description: Feel the Newsis a variety comedy show that also tells you how to feel about the news. After wowing zoomers all over on TikTok by giving them news with a sense of humour and anarchy, hostMarcela Onyangodecided to bring their strong feelings about the news IRL. During this very fun comedy variety hour, Marcela will humorously tell you how to feel about the news from an anarchist perspective while very funny comedians keep you laughing. In addition to very funny comedians, every month's show raises funds for direct action projects like mutual aid for people seeking asylum. So come laugh and support your community. You will leave the show more radical and more empowered, I promise.June‚Äôs lineup includesDylan AdlerLaura LahamApril BoddieTrashKingAndrea ColemanSHAYKSTARRSunny LapradeAlex KimBruno IfebiPooja ReddyALL SALES FINALTickets

data.title: Ricardo Grilli Trio
data.description: Experience an unforgettable evening at Friends and Lovers in Brooklyn as the Ricardo Grilli Trio brings their electrifying fusion of modern jazz, rock, funk, and Brazilian rhythms to the stage. Led by guitarist Ricardo Grilli, a rising star in the jazz scene who has graced iconic venues such as Smalls Jazz Club, The Blue Note, and the 55 Bar, the trio delivers a dynamic performance that blends virtuosic improvisation with infectious grooves. Drawing inspiration from luminaries like John Scofield and Eric Krasno, Grilli's compositions and arrangements showcase his unique voice as a composer and guitarist. With a rich musical background that includes performances with artists like Chris Potter, Aaron Parks, and Joe Martin, this is a night of music you won't want to miss.TICKETS

data.title: Ben Pagano + Nico Fox + Fury Young (Live)
data.description: Join us at Friends and Lovers for an eclectic evening of soulful and ethereal music featuring local NYC songwritersBen Pagano,Nico Fox, andFury Young.Ben Pagano is a local singer-songwriter, pianist and actor. His music is a blend of jazz, pop, soul, funk and psychedelia whilst maintaining a cohesiveness that defines the sound. His work is critically acclaimed and has been covered in publications such as New Yorker Magazine, Deli Magazine, Impose, Tiny Mixtapes to name some. He is currently working on his fourth album which will be released later this year.listen -benpagano.bandcamp.comBrooklyn-based artist Nico Fox, known professionally as Real Clothes, blends melancholy Appalachian folk with industrial rhythms, creating a sound fans describe as "haunted Sade" and"apocalypse pop." With four albums and numerous singles, including her latest, Undone by You, her music delves into themes of betrayal, revenge, and obsession.Beyond music, Fox is also a writer and the author of The Art of Transmutation, a poetry collection available in English and Haitian Krey√≤l.Listen-https://realclothes.bandcamp.com/Fury Young is an artland rocker and surrealist rapper who grew up in downtown NYC in the 1990s. For years he has worked in music championing voices of other artists with FREER Records (formerly Die Jim Crow) - the first label in America for musicians in prison and formerly incarcerated. All the while, Fury was working on songs of his own that he never had time to finish or release. That changed in October 2023 with the debut of "X Ray," Fury's first song on streaming. Fury will be releasing a full length album this summer.Listen -https://open.spotify.com/intl-es/artist/4VXTDaM4TCu8VRy8B6eCEOTickets

data.title: Quickies: Singles Event
data.description: Welcome to the hottest NYC-based singles event! Hotties everywhere are calling this event "better than hinge".Quickies is a loosely structured speed dating/singles mixer aimed to help the lonely, sexy, slutty folks of NYC find someone for the rest of their lives (or at least one night).Quickies is queer friendly. Feel free to write your preferences on your name-tag so others can know what to expect when chatting with you.We are partnering with Friends and Lovers's JAZZ NIGHT to create an intimate evening that can continue past the length of the speed dating event. Live Jazz will be played in the front bar until late. This is the perfect opportunity to get to know your strongest connection a little bit more.DETAILS:Wednesday, April 2nd at 7PM. Doors open at 7. Speed dating starts at 7:30 PM promptly.21+ (It's at a bar...)PLEASE SIGN UP WITH YOUR LEGAL NAME AND HAVE AN ID TO SHOW AT THE DOOR.Mid-20s to Late 30sCapacity will be limited to 75 participants so make sure you and your hot friends RSVP.FYI:Please be respectful, communicative, and consensual. All a*sh*les will be removed for the safety and wellbeing of the participants.Refunds will not be issued on the day of the event.DISCLAIMER: By attending this event, you agree to being photographed for marketing materials. If you object, please let me know and we will try our best to not to post any photos or videos taken of you.TICKETS

data.description: Join us Thursday April 10th for a live performance by Hundred in The Hand as they return to Brooklyn with support from Deer Lady.Hundred in The Hand¬†is a band¬†Based in the Dakotas fronted by vocalist, artist and activist Tokata Iron Eyes. A musical exercise in radical healing, and curious rage, serving as a sonic bridge between the stagnancy of traumas and the tenets of hope for a revolutionary future. The band is ever evolving and growing, co-creating with interchanging and intersecting artists across disciplines and the world.TICKETS

data.title: Nightlife United Community Happy Hour + Dance Party: Hosted by Venus Cuffs
data.description: Nightlife United is celebrating 5 years of industry impact withVenus Cuffs! A trailblazer in nightlife and cultural organizing, Venus Cuffs has created space and visibility for QTBIPOC communities, carving out room for joy, resistance, and radical celebration. Join us this Friday for a very specialCommunity Happy Hour fundraiser‚Äîa night of connection, music, and purpose.Nightlife United is an industry resource and advocacy non-profit coalition established by and for the Nightlife community. The organization is raising funds for theNU Workforce Development programthat upskills future Nightlife leaders from under-recognized communities.You‚Äôll be in the room with some of NYC‚Äôs most respected nightlife veterans‚Äîan amazing opportunity to network, ask questions, and soak up wisdom from the folks who‚Äôve built and sustained this city's cultural backbone.Expect:Incredible musicA room full of colleagues, creatives, supporters‚Äîand YOUThe chance to support the future of nightlife while celebrating its legacyDJ set by a special guest DJ (if you FnL then you know it'll be good!)Come early, stay late, and celebrate five years of impact with us.RSVP
